info.description:
This is a story about Horses growing to giant sizes.

Growth can be fast or slow, But not instantaneous.

Growth only for the Horses please.

Shrinking is allowed,1 inch being as small as you can go; but only Horses can only shrink back to their original size.

Not every chapter has to have growth in it. The main idea is that there is a Horse bigger than normal.

No fattening stuff please . Go nuts

Humans can only be male and female. Horses should be the only one to be herm, you can add a reason for the herm if you want.

Horses can be intelligent and smarter than humans or normal. If they are smart, please give a reason why. .

Scat stuff is allowed, but keep it to a minimum please. again go nuts with scat

Tf is also allowed but only humans into Horse, not the other way around.

Horses can be gentle, playful, rampaging, naughty whatever you want. That's up to you.

The Horses cannot talk unless you give a reason why they can.

No rules on sexual content.
